about_the_game:
Defeat enemies with enchanted weapons crafted using your cauldron featuring “in world crafting” to upgrade items, weapons and keys to help you save all 13 members of your coven. As you progress you will unlock the secrets of the other side. Find and harvest required occulted items to complete the necromantic ritual to save your coven.

Completing The Ritual

  • Find and save your lost covens jared heads from a cult of black magic users

  • Gather required body parts from fallen enemies to build your covens new bodies 

  • Collect and craft the skulls required to initiate the ritual

  • Proform the ritual and protect your coven as they pass back through to our world

Gameplay Features and Modes

  • "American Magic" Crafting tree will include 17th century to early 20th century gunpowder weapons

  • "Occult" Crafting tree will only include primitive gunpowder weapons a focus on melee and magic. 

Features

  • In depth in world crafting with the use of the cauldron

  • Fight waves of enemies and crawl dungeons

  • Action is broken up with crafting, collecting and looting, puzzles and exploration at your own risk.

  • Occulted crafting tree that must be discovered through trial and error

  • Controls FPS, Drag and drop items, Craft, Loot

content_descriptors.notes: Contains graphic images including gore, violance and weapons as well as Occult realted themes. Contents of this game is intended for a mature audiance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 945A
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Fight monsters from the other side using magical items and weapons crafted in world in order to succeed. Use “In World Crafting” to upgrade weapons and solve puzzles in order to help save your dismembered brothers and sisters by completing the necromantic ritual before their souls are lost forever.
